model

Class OnlineModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.OnlineModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model

    public class OnlineModel
extends java.util.Observable
implements Model
    The OnlineModel class extends Observable and implements Model. This class connected to server that save in the properties and send to him requests and return the answers to the user like all models.
    Since:
    16.6.2015
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Bar Magnezi and Senia Kalma
